title: Ep. 274: Bridgerton Hair and Beauty News with Co-Host Kathleen Hou from The Cut
itunes:title: Ep. 274: Bridgerton Hair and Beauty News with Co-Host Kathleen Hou from The Cut
itunes:subtitle: Guest co-host Kathleen Hou, the beauty director of New York Magazine’s The Cut, is here to analyze the hair on Bridgerton; discuss the week’s beauty news (Dolly Parton’s fragrance! Eco-friendly beauty sponges!); and talk about her job, her favorite bea...
description:
Guest co-host Kathleen Hou, the beauty director of New York Magazine’s The Cut, is here to analyze the hair on Bridgerton; discuss the week’s beauty news (Dolly Parton’s fragrance! Eco-friendly beauty sponges!); and talk about her job, her favorite beauty tips, and some of her go-to products—including the best tubing mascaras for straight lashes. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Products Mentioned: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a "Raise A Wand" Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
